website_summaries.verdict: This low-profile trunk organizer comes in two sizes and also features a no-slip bottom design.
pros: Comes with removable dividers and has lower sides, so it's easy to reach inside
Features sturdy handles, so you can carry it with confidence, and it can be folded down when not in use
cons: Expensive and slides a little more than some like

customer_reviews.title: TESLA owners need to get this!
customer_reviews.text: Leaving a review for TESLA Model S owners. This will fit in your trunk in a trunk, aka sub-trunk. The sub-trunk isn't perfectly flat in the Model S, so this will be a bit uneven longways, and this also causes the dividers to be just ever so little slightly too tall and hit the sub-trunk cover. Easy solution is to slightly angle the dividers to the side so that they are not as tall, and vollia! Super useful!
customer_reviews.author: vash_tbTop Contributor: Hiking

customer_reviews.title: Stinky
customer_reviews.text: The size if this cargo holder is perfect and I really like that it's not tall. The dividers move quite easily and seem to stay in place. It's structure is solid and seems like it will last a while. But, Phew weee this thing really stinks. Smells like hot rubber. I'm going to let it set out side for a few weeks and hopefully let the smell dissipate before we put it in our new Jeep. Well, it's been a few weeks of sitting out in the open and this thing still stinks. I'm sending it back for a refund or at least an Amazon credit.
customer_reviews.author: Rick L.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely strong rubber smell.  Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy, does it's job, but SMELLS of rubber, the warmer it is the worse it gets. Would love to return it but too late. Otherwise nice product. UPDATE: Contacted Manufacturer, they denied the fact that there is an off gasing problem. My car stinks since I have an open back in my SUV. As it gets warmer in the spring it smells worse. It's been months and smell is getting worse. Would never buy again, especially since manufacture is ignoring the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Puck

customer_reviews.title: It's like they soaked it in rotten oil and gasoline
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these guys need to remove this potentially dangerous product. The smell is so unbearable I almost had to pull over on the way to work after putting it in my car. It's like they soaked it in rotten oil and gasoline, and then never washed it off. It burned my nose and throat just from having it in the car. So awful, and so unbelievable that people are still buying this. The problem here is that it is random on whether you get the "smelly" one or not. I recommend you do not buy this product, period, or they'll keep getting sales on a product that might actually be dangerous to your health.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Height is Incorrect
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. It is robust and feels like it will last a long time. I would give this 5 stars but the dimensions advertised are not the actual dimensions. It is advertised as having a height of 7 inches. The box is 7 inches but with the dividers the total height is 9.5 inches. It would not be a big deal but I bought this to fit inside of overland drawers I built for my truck. I will still use it, as I said it a good product. But I cannot use it as I intended. The whole reason I purchased this is because the description said it was 7 inches high.
customer_reviews.author: ego

customer_reviews.title: Very strong odor
customer_reviews.text: Top quality product that I'm going to find very useful. I'm really impressed with how easy it is to move the dividers and how sturdy the product is. The only thing that has turned me off is the smell. It is very very strong. I've airing it out in the garage for a week and it still has a very strong smell. The smell is way too strong to put it in my car at this time.
customer_reviews.author: K Selby

customer_reviews.title: Smells REALLY bad.
customer_reviews.text: This thing smells so bad. I don't know what they make it out of, but I thought someone spilled insecticide in my car. It smells so bad I had to take it out of my car after the first day, it's just disgusting. I'm going to let it air out in the sun for a few days, and maybe douse it with some odor eliminators, but if I wouldn't have thrown away the original packaging, I would have returned it already. It's really toxic smelling.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: The SMELL IS HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. THE SMELL!!!!! I have tried everything that the manufacturer suggested. Peppermint oil, lysol, soap/water- nothing works. Put it in the back of my car- nope- hot day- stunk my car up so bad......They suggested leaving it outside in the sun= makes it 10 times worse-just heats up the glue that give off an awful odor. I live in Texas- this is not ideal- its always hot here. *****Update- spoke with company- they sent me a brand new one that is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Great design ... ruined by cheap material with overpowering industrial/chemical stink
customer_reviews.text: A great design ruined by cheap materials! It's a shame. I looked at a lot of these, and this design was best. But after receiving it, it stinks - literally - it has an extremely strong industrial/chemical stink that screams made-cheap-in-China. Leaving it open in my garage for an entire week did nothing - except stink up my garage. I'll never accept any product with this stink - who knows what those chemicals can do to you!
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Smells like it was soaked in gasoline
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to getting this. The design and construction are very good. However, it has a very strong smell like it was soaked in gasoline. I can't put it in my car because the smell is overwhelming. I have it sitting in my garage hoping it will air out. If not, I'll have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: webdevgirl

customer_reviews.title: No more rolling groceries!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Subaru Forester. SUV has a bag hook on each side in back, but hauling 5 or 6 bags of groceries has always been a pain. With every turn I could hear things rolling around. And what to do with the milk? This organizer was more expensive than some other products I considered but I bought it for two reasons. First, reviews described it to be a "quality" product and I'd agree. And second, it is LARGER than other orgranizers I checked out. Compare widths! This has four compartments...and fits perfectly across the back of my Subie!
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but smells.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely high quality.......BUT, it stinks like a potent chemical that will not go away. I've let this thing breath on my front porch for 2 straight days and sprayed it with multiple cleaners (Febrese Auto, Lavender scented Lysol, and General Purpose Cleaner with Febrese) and it still puts off a potent, foul odor. There is no way I'm putting this in my 2019 4Runner (other than the quick pictures I took). Fits good so hopefully one day it will stop stinking because I really love the design of this thing. I probably would look elsewhere for a similar item. Note: I received this well packaged within 2 days of ordering.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell!
customer_reviews.text: This thing stinks, it really does. It smells like the fakest of fake rubber. If you ever got a cheap pair of shoes with "PU Leather", it smells like that. I could actually smell it through the packaging and once I got it out of the packaging the smell was so horrid it stuck up the first floor of our house. There is no way this is going in the back of our SUV. Maybe if you had a car with a sealed trunk it would be ok, but in the open air in back of an SUV, the smell would be nauseating!
customer_reviews.author: Brad_VA

customer_reviews.title: Helps hold my items upright in a small trunk
customer_reviews.text: I really like how well this works in my small trunk. I have set the dividers to have a small section for holding re-useable grocery bags and there are two sections on each side of this item (between the side of the organizer and the wall of the trunk) now that work well for keeping my work bag upright. Or anything else I pack in there. It is a very sturdy item, it doesn't slide around at all.
customer_reviews.author: Davis Senior

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, stink is horrendous
customer_reviews.text: The velcro that attaches the dividers doesn't attach well. YES, the stink is real. Let it de-fume for a week, before putting it my trunk. I could smell the burnt rubber smell inside the car, and from outside the car. The smell transferred over to containers of cocunut water that were being stored in it, and anything else. Had to detox my car for a week (Long 1400 mile drive). This product is still airing out in my garage, and still stinks after a month. Aside from that, it's the perfect size for my 2016 For Fusion trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Everett

customer_reviews.title: but it's amazing! The bottom of the organizer is stiff and ...
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is the BOMB.COM. I am in medical sales. I have lots of samples to carry around in the back of my SUV. I was very surprised that the compartments could be sized just as you want them. I was initially worried that the velcro wouldn't hold, but it's amazing! The bottom of the organizer is stiff and really holds to the floor of the compartment--no sliding!!! The only thing I wish is that the company would make a bigger size--not longer, but wider for those people who need to use for work. Other than that, this is just an amazing organizer. You could fit grocery bags in the compartments or many different items.
customer_reviews.author: Cherylb114

customer_reviews.title: Semi-Hard Sided!! Stays in Place, Stays Upright!
customer_reviews.text: Have had several "organizers", but nothing like this. Have had my original one now for 4yrs and never had a problem. Works like a champ for holding lots of various items in place and vertical in the trunk, or backend of the SUV. Groceries, bottles, liquids, casserole dishes, etc. Easy to take out, even with stuff in it, thanks to the handles on the end. Easy to customize and adjust with the velcro tabs (if you need to move the divider walls to make for a narrower or wider compartment. Loved it so much I bought 2 more as Christmas presents this past year and they love it too.
customer_reviews.author: UberGeek

customer_reviews.title: Corvette C7 owners mandatory buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely mandatory for C7 corvette owners! You are able to throw groceries etc in there without having to worry about anything sliding around including the organize regardless of how you race through the mountains. This product has been tested thoroughly by me in this regard. If you are in law enforcement, I deny these comments! Additionally which is the biggest point for purchase is the ability to have your roof top locked in place on top of it perfectly without the need to collapse the unit. In my car club every other corvette owner that I show it to click to purchase while standing there.
customer_reviews.author: Hans Miller

customer_reviews.title: Smelled profusely like chemicals and tar - returned immediately
customer_reviews.text: It smelled really bad like chemicals and tar. The manufacturing chemicals that were used were very strong. I was going to let it air out but there is no way it will be getting better. Maybe it was just a bad batch. I immediately reboxed and returned. Not going in the new Tesla!
customer_reviews.author: 84Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing and would buy it again! It holds all my shopping bags, and if I buy something larger, like a watermelon, I just push the organizer back a little and put it in front of the organizer. No more standing on my head trying to get that watermelon out of the area behind the seats. It doesn't slip or slide around and I use one of the compartments for the owners manual and a spare jacket. Where else are you going to put that darn thing? Using velcro to adjust the compartment sizes is a little hinky, and I could think of better ways, but what the heck, it works.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Model Y - Almost perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Like others, I bought this for our model y. Been disappointed by the quality of storage compartments before but I'm not with this one. It's very sturdy when in the car. You do have to sort of wedge it in there. It's about 1/2-1" too wide for the trunk but not when you push it in - like other reviewers said. Warning - it had a very strong smell and I had to air it out for almost a week. But no smell since and was 100% worth it. Fits groceries, bags, wet jackets from rain, etc.
customer_reviews.author: CokeWins

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for lower trunk storage on my Tesla Model S
customer_reviews.text: So, yes, there is that chemical smell. I guess it depends on your nose. I figured I’d at least give it a go; I have both the cover over it as well as a rubber trunk floor mat over the compartment where it sits. While I can smell it some when I open up my floor to get something, when closed I don't smell it at all. I personally feel for the price, size & ability to add organizational storage under the trunk this piece is a totally worthwhile investment. Looks & fits great, holds tons of stuff as well.
customer_reviews.author: Halls1030

customer_reviews.title: Strong and awful plastic smell
customer_reviews.text: While I want to like it, it stinks like plastic. I was waiting to write a review to see if the smell would wear off after a few months but no dice. The strong plastic smell is honestly awful and I might just throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: keith k

customer_reviews.title: Nauseating plastic compounds
customer_reviews.text: Nauseating smell from plastic compounds used in this product that is made in Asia. Filled house with fumes. Left outside for 24 hours and still couldn't be brought into house, let alone car due to fumes. Very surprised that Amazon sells this product under their name.
customer_reviews.author: GreenDream

customer_reviews.title: Well made and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Has a high end feel and look. Compartments can be organized at the width you like. Build quality and materials used are consistent with price point. You will be pleasantly surprised when this arrives and looks great in my trunk along over cargo liner. Sure, there are cheaper well made options out there but, this unit is for those willingly to pay slightly more for a refined trunk organizer to satisfy your OCD.
customer_reviews.author: George Irakis

customer_reviews.title: I work in IT and love to keep some go-to tools
customer_reviews.text: Been loving this for my Tesla Model S. I work in IT and love to keep some go-to tools, equipment, adapters/cables etc in this storage containers. I keep the far left one a bit bigger and it's great for dropping in the 5 Gallon water jug I fill up. The smell people talk about was definitely out of the box but I left it overnight with a normal box fan on low blowing on it all night. Not much difference in the morning to be honest but I swear I've never smelled the factory smell not once since putting it in.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Have to be creative to get rid of smell.
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars if it wasn't for the terrible smell (rubber material de-gassing). Quick spray with stain cleaner outside and a rinse with a garden hose and jet nozzle took most of the smell out, but it is still there. I only let it sit out for about 3 days with one day being completely in the sun. Most cheap vinyl/rubber products have this issue; I am pretty sure it is not healthy to be inhaling these gasses. Otherwise, this product is superb in all regards.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Well Made. Sturdy, Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I knew I’d love this before I ordered it. My bf purchased the same one a year ago and after I recently purchased a new Jeep Grand Cherokee I needed something to put in the back to keep things from moving around. This was the first thing I thought of and I’m so happy I ordered it. It is made extremely well. Very sturdy and heavy enough to stay in place when nothing is in it. It has 3 dividers that can be moved to different sizes and are secured with Velcro. If you’re considering this and another product I can assure you this one is better.
customer_reviews.author: ErinMarie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but smell and tendency to slide around are detractors to the overall package
customer_reviews.text: Despite having a rigid base. it still slides around in my hatch quote freely and needs a secondary retention mechanism (bungee cords or zip ties on the handles) Additionally, despite having it for a few months, the smell hasn't really dissipated yet. Other than that, it holds all my stuff just fine and works well for item organization.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: The smell is real!
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid closer attention to the one-star reviews on this organizer. Unfortunately the smell is overbearing. I was going to let it air out a bit, but after reading other folks experience trying that, I decided to pack it right back up and request a refund. It really does have an overbearing gasoline smell. That said, it did seem like a quality organizer otherwise. I'm a bit disappointed that the smell is so strong.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Reber

customer_reviews.title: A little planning, this really worked / fit  in back of our Ford Explorer.
customer_reviews.text: Just right for us, towels, first aid kit, tools, personal emergency toiletries, our pizza 🍕 bag, folded up cooler bag and extra tissue box. BUT HAD WE NOT FOUND THE PERFECT BUNGEE CORD TO SECURE IT, IT WOULD SLIDE ALL OVER. 4 stars for not having a rubbery base so it wouldn’t slide at every stop and turn. Note: our success was in part to measuring every thing that we wanted to put in it and where it would go before ordering!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Must off-gas before use!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful organizer. Very practical and heavier than expected. Super rigid, weighted base helps keep this organizer put when accelerating or braking. Side mounted eyelets allow for attachment to vehicle mounting points for extra security. BEFORE USING: ALLOW TO OFF-GAS! A week or so in a well ventilated are should diminish the toxicity enough so you don't immediately get sick when entering the vehicle or having your interior soft goods smell like a chemical plant. I would recommend this to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with Good Adaptability
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with this organizer. It seems to be very sturdy, well made and easy to adapt for varying sizes of items to be carried in the car. The size of it is just right for my 2019 Honda Passport. I had hesitated to order this after seeing all the negative reviews noting strong rubber/petroleum odors. No issues at all with any smell with this organizer, even right out of the packaging. This is also very easy to fold up when additional room is needed. I would definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Was concerned about the odor
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to help organize the trunk of my car. While there are many positive reviews, I was concerned about the negative ones. Specifically regarding the oil like smell. I even selected two other choices planning on returning it back to Amazon if the smell was over powering. Fortunately, only a small sense of oil smell. I left it outside of the box for a day. It is now in my trunk and I canceled the others. Works well and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Yankee7

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and highly dependable
customer_reviews.text: I had received the bigger version of this organizer as a gift a while ago and I use it every single shopping trip or road trip. This one went as a gift to a friends' family and they are already user converts. Besides the sturdiness of the piece (looks like new after 3 years of usage), I love that I can move the dividers inside to hold various sizes of bags, toys, shoes, jackets, etc. I also love the handles, which give me the opportunity to take out my whole shopping load in one go.
customer_reviews.author: Danuta

customer_reviews.title: Like it but don't love it
customer_reviews.text: I have/had the smaller version of this trunk organizer. Unfortunately the trim around the bottom because undone and it hung over the crates in had in my car. I decided to find a larger organizer and most had very high sides that would be inconvenient; the larger sized Rola popped up as a suggestion. Due to it's low siding and the fact that the quality of the overall product is decent I decided to buy it. It was expected except the gas smell that emits from it is really bad, like air out for a week bad before putting into your vehicle. Overall it's a decent organizer (hoping the trim doesn't come unglued again.)
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: This is great. It's wide and is a good fit in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It's wide and is a good fit in the back of my Mazda CX-5, with maybe a bit over an inch to spare on the sides when up against the back of the rear seats. I use it to store reusable shopping bags, emergency supplies, an umbrella, etc. The sides aren't super high so if you have big dreams of stacking loose items high, this won't work. Otherwise it'll do the job! This stays in place with a rubber lip around the edge of the base. I liked this over alternatives because I didn't want velcro on my brand new interior. It stays put great.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Must have accessory for CR-V.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this for our CR-V, perfect size. Honda brand is almost the same price, and not even close to the same quality. This has adjustable compartments and a heavy rubber base so it doesn't slide. Works perfect with the Honda cargo tray. It also folds down for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: I love the sturdiness and design of this
customer_reviews.text: I love the sturdiness and design of this, however, if you have a cargo mat, this will slide around and it gets annoying. I wish it had a rubber base so or some type of way to secure it with ties - I would pay more for those features so I didn't have to hear it (when not weighed down with contents in it) sliding around. Aside from that minor annoyance, it's a great looking, great quality organizer and holds contents while also providing a level of protection since it is sturdy. It's not cheap or flimsy like some organizers.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly but poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a storage organizer that fits my trunk perfectly, I thought that this was a little pricey, but the dimensions worked great for my Hyundai Kona. My biggest issue was the really bad packaging that it came in. It pretty much was opened and fell out of the box when I got it. Luckily it wasn't damaged, and I like how it looks in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny N

customer_reviews.title: Great product with one major flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Based on all the good reviews I ordered this up. It's nice and rigid and holds everything I need to carry with me really well. The critical flaw? This thing slides all over my trunk. I fixed it my stapling a drawer liner to the bottom, but the fact that I had to modify it all is annoying. Beyond that I'd give it 5 stars, but it's still a pretty major flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P

customer_reviews.title: Great product 👍
customer_reviews.text: This item holds up well and looks great. It has plenty of room and keeps your stuff right where you want it. Build quality is top notch and it is quite versatile as it fits many applications. I have used it between all my vehicles and it fits them all perfectly. No weird smells either and even in the sun it still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Chris X

customer_reviews.title: Really like this when buying groceries,
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this trunk organizer. Easy to adjust compartment sizes and easy to fold down for larger items. Really helps groceries from rolling around or turning over. Definitely would recommend this for someone who wants to keep groceries from rolling around.
customer_reviews.author: beejlang-Houston

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best trunk organizer we've ever tried!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best trunk organizer we've ever tried! We use this in the back of our Jeep Cherokee and it fits perfectly and leaves over half the area empty so we can fit larger items in front of it. The dividers move so you can make each compartment any size you want. It is not too high, so it's easy to remove bags from the compartments. It is heavy enough to not slide around, yet light enough to lift the entire thing out if you want to carry everything in at one time. LOVE it and planning on buying another for our other SUV!
customer_reviews.author: Cobra

customer_reviews.title: It is the exact size I wanted, but it ...
customer_reviews.text: It is the exact size I wanted, but it smells of strong rubber still after 4 months. I have had outside during the winter under shelter. I now have it in the attic trying to "bake off the smell" I would not buy again unless smell goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Incredible organizer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! I am shocked at how amazing this thing is. Such a simple concept and yet I can't believe how useful and well designed it is. Pay the extra money, don't buy cheaper junk-you will love it. This thing does not budge at all when driving and organizes everything very nicely. I smile every time I open my trunk, and for the first time it is all organized. Just bought another one for my wife, she had to have one when she saw mine ha ha ha
customer_reviews.author: Ack Ack

customer_reviews.title: Great rigid design
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this because of the cost; however, I am a fan. It fits perfectly in the trunk of my small car, and the rigidity of the product is a lot nicer than the flexible organizer I was previously using. I liked the flexible one just fine, my husband did not. I'm glad he insisted on the Rola. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Amy M. Earls

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer!
customer_reviews.text: It is currently sitting comfortably in the trunk of my 2007 Mazda Miata MX-5. Other brands organizers are just waaay too big to fit the Miata's tiny trunk. Bought at $40, it was pretty expensive (compared to all the other trunk organizers out there) but it's the only one I've seen listed on Amazon that would fit the Miata trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: What smell?
customer_reviews.text: I smelled nothing. And I was looking for scent from the reviews. My wife smelled nothing and she was not looking for a scent. My co-worker, who can smell a gnats ass from 50 yards, said what are you talking about? No scent. Great product, if a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There is a smell
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty organizer that I put in my truck bed. Have a Silverado 1500 with a plastic bed liner and tonneau cover and it takes 3/4 lengthwise of the bed space. Good for organizing small/medium utility gear/tools. It will slide around so recommend using with one of those cargo bars. Good thing its in the back cause it does have a oily/tar smell to it. This would be a 5 star if it weren't for that smell.
customer_reviews.author: JoeyL.

customer_reviews.title: It does what it+s supposed to !!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2016 370Z roadster. It has no way to place any bags of product without having them fall over. With a small trunk, options are limited. The smaller organizer is perfect! I was concerned when I read about the offensive smell the product had, but their was none. GREAT product,,,,, GREAT price !!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly back in the "smaller" space of my trunk. (I measured beforehand.) The slots are adjustable. As a person that keeps anything I might need in my car, this is a must. I have had trunk organizer's previously that I've paid $20-30 for and they aren't half the quality of this one. I believe this will last for at least the life of my car. FYI: My car is a 2014 Civic Sedan and as you can see, it is a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great trunk organizer
customer_reviews.text: Got this size, and the larger one for our cars several years ago, and really like it. Got another vehicle so wanted one for it as well. These appear to be quite sturdy, the easily collapsible design, with the adjustable dividers, is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: WhtShadow

customer_reviews.title: Smell is a non issue and it’s well constructed...
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I didn’t listen to other reviews that complained about the smell. And while it does smell like plastic it’s not bad at all. It’s a very sturdy container. The rubber bottom stays planted on my weathertech trunk liner. And the dividers are adjustable, which was a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Greggo

customer_reviews.title: Trunk organizer that actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several different trunk organizers & the ROLA 59001 M.O.V.E. is among the best. *Noticably well made & sturdy. *Smart design with anchor tabs, carry handles, adjustable dividers, mesh outer pockets, heavy duty non-slip base. *Nice & wide for SUV's or mini-vans. *Folds-up for flat stowage. $$$-The ROLA is a bit pricier than the competition but the quality & usability set to warrant it.
customer_reviews.author: Bshops2much!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my SUV
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size trunk organizer for my Mazda CX9. Doesn't slide around. Adjustable center dividers. Heavy duty construction. No smell that I noticed, but I did set it outside on the porch for a couple days when I got it to air out just in case. This has also been super helpful to hold groceries here in Hawaii since stores no longer use plastic bags and I always forget the reusable cloth ones. I just dump my groceries back in the cart without a bag and then throw them in this organizer when I get to the car. Would buy again and recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Smells Bad
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and could smell it before it even came out of the box...a heavy petrochemical smell. Yuk. I'm airing it outside now but don't want to put this smelly thing into my brand new car...so it's going back. It otherwise looks sturdy. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: BnE

customer_reviews.title: Strong industrial chemical odor
customer_reviews.text: Unless you enjoy the stink of industrial waste, we recommend avoiding this trunk organizer. We used it in an SUV for three days and the stench was horrible. Sunny warm temps made it worse.
customer_reviews.author: heimerwisen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for shopping bags and such to keep things from flying around in back of trunk.
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty much in agreement with everyone else here who have expressed their liking of this product. It is very well put together and collapses nicely. It's solid. My main suggestion and I don't know if it's possible or not with this being collapsible and solid, is that I would enjoy it even more if the height was a little higher to stack more things in it that are loose. It is fine if you bag everything as it will stay in a bag, but not so if you stack things loosely.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and allows for the roof to be stowed in the trunk. Very happy with that. Its very sturdy although there is slight bowing in the sides and wish it came with hooks or fasteners to secure it in the trunk to prevent movement. I had to purchase carabiners to attached it to the trunk side hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Jared M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits Tesla Model S rear trunk perfectly. Well made. Doesn't slide around in the trunk with acceleration or braking.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Measurments not exact!!!  A little bigger than described
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to keep the stuff organized in my trunk and to stuff it from sliding around. The size is not correct though! The actual size of the organizer I believe is correct but it has a frame-like seam around the bin with a rubber strip/protector probably so you don't scratch your car inside. TO get this to fit, I had to take the rubber ring off and it was still a squeeze. I know these measurements were made for my car because on the Ford site, the cargo organizer made for my car had the same dimensions as this one.
customer_reviews.author: arf1167

customer_reviews.title: Handy Storage
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Works well for torage on top of engine cover between front seats of our tour bus to hold miscellaneous items since there is no glove box or storage space. Does slide around some since the engine cover has a slight down angle to it, but some Velcro should stop that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rola 59000 M.O.V.E. Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Perfect size for my needs. I use it to store my mountain biking gear. Keeps all my gear in one place, easy loading in and out of the cargo area of my Jeep GC. The adjustable dividers work well, the rigid base is great too. Only complaint is the initial odor of the material. Let it air out for a couple days in the garage, odor is gone. Highly recommended, good value. Ordering a second one for my wife to keep the groceries from rolling around in the cargo area of her Highlander.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie A.

customer_reviews.title: It fits well and works well, but smells funny
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to organize the trunk in a 2017 Chevy Bolt EV. It fits nicely, and it makes grocery transport much less messy; but it emits a vague smell resembling gasoline which permeates the cabin, especially on warm days. I hope that the chemical aroma fades over time, as it's a bit unpleasant, and it is strange to smell gasoline in an EV.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Bellows

customer_reviews.title: The Best Grocery Bag Holder For Your Trunk
customer_reviews.text: FIRST-RATE!!! This fits perfectly in my trunk and is very well designed to haul groceries. The center partitions can be removed or moved around to accommodate whatever you are carrying. It did have a slight smell when it arrived, so I put it outside for a few days. No smell now. It also stays in place. No more fallen-over grocery bags all over my trunk. Get this now!
customer_reviews.author: Kris O.

customer_reviews.title: Needs more upper support
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice organizer but I've discovered one fairly big problem for me. When I put this in the lower portion of my Explorer behind the 3rd row and try to lift it out, the top edge folds outwards and gets caught making it very difficult to remove. It's so long it needs more support on the top on the long sides. Also the velcro on the dividers doesn't stay put very well. Kind of disappointed with my purchase based on the reviews but I think this was still my best option based on the other organizers out there
customer_reviews.author: D. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for Tesla Model S
customer_reviews.text: The trunk storage was a perfect fit for the Tesla Model S trunk well. I also bought on for the trunk area between the wheel wells but it's not a pefect fit. I laid it on top of a foam mat which did the trick. Overall, the item is good and strong. The diveders are moveable and a seem to do a good job. The trunk storage is not deep so keep that in mind if you are thinking about taller items.
customer_reviews.author: Kha N. Phan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful organizer, but BAD smell
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful trunk organizer, and I'm hoping in a few months that it stops smelling up my trunk with its pungent chemical odor, but in the meantime I can still appreciate how efficiently it holds items securely and folds up. The -1 Star is due to the smell. It's bad. Really bad. UPDATE: After about a month the odor went away. Be warned. I am a longtime Amazon Prime customer who enjoys writing reviews in my free time. If you have any questions or comments about this product or my review, feel free to message me and I'll be glad to help!
customer_reviews.author: K. LeCrone

customer_reviews.title: Just right for a big sedan trunk
customer_reviews.text: The trunk of our car is very big, so keeping groceries from falling all over the place, we needed this. Heavy enough to stay in place by itself. It seems to be well stitched and made to last. Velcro allows you to set the dividers where you want. It can be folded down/clipped shut, but we leave it up most of the time. Be sure to measure your trunk interior before purchasing. This can be slid to the front or rear of our trunk, not all car trunks are the same. Original cardboard package is wrapped in plain heavy cardboard for shipment. Arrived within estimated delivery date. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rola 59000 M.O.V.E. Rigid-Base Interior Organizer (25" x 15") -- Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The trunk organizer was surprisingly heavier than I expected (in a good way). It's sturdy, well constructed and the perfect size. If fits nicely in the cargo area of my 370Z. As advertised it does not slide around at all, it simply stays put where it's positioned and it doesn't leave any deep marks in the carpet. The bottom is solid enough to carry a couple of bags of cans or several jugs of juice or milk without folding in. It was delivered well packaged and on time. With respect to this product I feel my money was well spent and I would recommend this product. Especially to those with limited trunk or cargo space.
customer_reviews.author: pbroberts

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Useful
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those items where you see and think, "How did I not know this existed, and why did I not buy one earlier?" It works great, I subsequently bought the larger version of the product for my other car. I provides solid, adaptable storage, but also collapses and reassembles without any problems. I have read other reviewers comment on the chemical aroma that this product gives off, and after having recently purchased two it was nothing I noticed. If you have an open style trunk, as in an SUV or hatchback, and you are looking for a way to more efficiently store your various and sundries on the way home, this should fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: B.B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: What I like most about the Rola 59001 trunk organizer is that ...
customer_reviews.text: What I like most about the Rola 59001 trunk organizer is that it is substantial, well built, and that it fits nicely in the Bolt EV luggage space. What I like least is the smell, not something I want to be breathing. Hopefully the smell will go away so that I can leave it in the car. I've left it sitting out in the garage for six days and the smell remains. Without the smell I'd give it five stars. We'll see... Update. Finally after a month or so the smell disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT D

customer_reviews.title: F-150 Floor Organizer
customer_reviews.text: To say that this organizer is "tough" or "rugged" is not an exaggeration. It's about as strong as you could expect without it becoming prohibitively heavy. The dividers are easily movable and add to the units rigidity when upright. The side handles make it easy to life the entire thing out of your vehicle if the need arises. Folding it back to flat is also easy. The very best part is that it fits on the floor of my F-150 Crew Cab pickup with the seat down.
customer_reviews.author: retlod

customer_reviews.title: Rigid and longest organizer on Amazon... smell dissipates
customer_reviews.text: As of Oct 2020 this is the longest organizer at 38" long. I was searching for some time to find a rigid organizer that could carry the folding camping chairs. The chairs fit perfect and this fits snuggly against the back seat in the trunk of a 2020 Camry. It does have a rubber smell, but nothing to crazy or noxious. Great product and company. Would buy other products from Rola.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, with some caveats
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to adjust, and easy to collapse. The bottom has some grip to it but I'm not sure I'd call it non-slip—it's going to slide around a bit, particularly if your trunk is carpeted. Other reviewers have noted the strong smell and they are correct—it smells like gasoline. Be prepared to let it sit around for a few days to air out before you put it in your car, unless you don't mind the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Benski

customer_reviews.title: Great for convertibles
customer_reviews.text: I really needed a less tall trunk organizer so that it would not hinder the folding roof top of my convertible. This is the only one I could find and its perfect (though its certainly pricier than other options)
customer_reviews.author: Rajesh Sahasrabuddhe

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Works great to organize the storage space under the bed in our rv. Keeps fragile items like the coffee pot from being damaged while traveling. Sturdy base and quality stitching. This will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Load
customer_reviews.text: Much easier to load than my previous all-soft unit, which routinely collapsed on its own at the worst possible hands-already-full-and-it's-raining moments. Holds about 6-7 plastic-style bags of groceries, if stacked creatively and the stars are right. I'm satisfied. Save yourself some frustration, learn from my mistake, grit your teeth, and go ahead and pay for a rigid-based unit to begin with. You'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Geusz

customer_reviews.title: Love so much I have bought 2!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased because I loved the 1st one so much. I have a subaru outback and it fits two in the back and helps me stay organized. I love how you can adjust the sleeves because they have velcro. This one also clicks into the 1st one so they don't slid around when I am driving. I am so happy I bought this second one!
customer_reviews.author: 1443giggles

customer_reviews.title: Works Well in My Subaru
customer_reviews.text: This organizer works very well in my 2015 Subaru Forester, it stays in place even when I take a sharp corner. I use it for many things but I really like it for groceries I even put large watermelon in it and it keeps the melon from rolling all over the back of my vehicle. It can be folded down if needed however, mine is always up. In fact I like it so much that I purchased one for my sister new car.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to the trunk to keep things neat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to the trunk to keep things neat! I bought two of these and placed them side by side in the back of my car primarily to keep groceries from tumbling around. They work fantastically, providing just the right support without taking up too much space itself. They can be adjusted inside, using the removable center panels. They can be placed wherever you like to make larger, smaller or even no compartments to customize whatever you are carrying. Two organizers is about perfect for holding a week's worth of our family groceries, or a trip to Target. Nice quality and very functional. So glad I gave them a try. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Schrader

customer_reviews.title: Essential For Multitaskers
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2015 Jeep Grand Cherokee Overland and this fits perfectly in the back. It is sturdy and well made. Each compartments help me keep everything well organized. I usually keep gear for my dogs, yoga mats and towels and grocery bags always in my car and this keeps them all well organized with plenty of room for groceries. Took we a while to find the right product and I am grateful to have found this!
customer_reviews.author: Hammy

customer_reviews.title: I like it for my land cruiser.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the strong rubber smell everyone complained about. I put mine in the sun for a day and left in the garage for a week. It’s been in my car for 4 days and no smell . We’ll built . I bought the smaller size and may buy another . I would rather have two small ones than one large
customer_reviews.author: W N Carl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for organizing everything in my jeep for weekend camping trips. It's expensive for what it is, however, I had it on the roof of the jeep during a storm that killed two of our tents and it was just fine. It's got a great surface on the bottom that keeps it from moving at all. Held up very well with the wind, rain and sand. Still looks (and smells) brand new!
customer_reviews.author: William McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product and very useful.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. It's well made and I like how you can collapse it flat if you need to. The three inserts are adjustable too - a great feature. I've had people come up to me in the parking lot at the grocery store and ask what it is and where I got it. It really helps to keep your groceries from rolling all over the place in the back of your truck/large trunk, etc. The non-skid base works really well and keeps the unit from moving around in your trunk when it's loaded.
customer_reviews.author: Robert LaBella

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to setup and fits nicely inside the trunk compartment of the X. Velcro dividers enables custom size compartments and sturdy enough to lift the entire assembly out of the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: ninja

customer_reviews.title: Large size and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A must have for all lady drivers who grocery shop often. This trunk organizer is one of larger ones which provides enough storage for few bags or other items that need to be transported.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is such a sturdy and nicely sized product. Have been using it for several months and I’m super happy with how it holds up. It did smell very badly upon first receiving it, but after airing out was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great product for storing items in your car, ability to quickly remove it and free up truck space is very convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is the second car organizer I have purchased. The first one was too big for my new car (worked perfectly in my 2006 Audi A4) and this one fits perfectly (2012 Lexus IS250) The only complaint I have is the wider they are, the harder they are to carry in and out of the car because the base isn't completely solid. However, in the event you need to ability to flex it to get it in the opening of the trunk, then the base would be perfect. All in all, I would buy this again and again to organize items in my trunk, it really doesn't get any better than this
customer_reviews.author: EasyE11

customer_reviews.title: it has a powerful and annoying odor. Even after airing it out for several ...
customer_reviews.text: The Rola 59001 fit in my C7 Corvette and it works well. However, it has a powerful and annoying odor. Even after airing it out for several days. So, I sprayed it with Febreze, which helped but the odor is still not gone and I've had it for 3 months. My new car smell has been overpowered by this and I'm not happy. Other reviewers have commented on the odor as well. I would not recommend this item because the odor is so offensive.
customer_reviews.author: RICK H.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Organizer. Built Well.
customer_reviews.text: Car: 2015 WRX Pros: Built with great materials. Feel sturdy and solid. Definitely doesn't feel cheap! Great storage capacity and doesn't take up too much room (I fit this in with my golf bag and still have space for many more things). Compartments are adjustable. Cons: People claim it doesn't slid around on them, and while it doesn't move from one side of the trunk to the other, I do occasionally open the trunk to find it had slid 6 inches one way or the other... Not exactly a deal breaker, but slight disappointing to know it's moving around back there while I'm driving.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality! LOVE LOVE LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! The rubbery surface that covers the bottom makes it stay put like a champ while driving. The moveable dividers come in handy and move easily. It folds very flat when not in use and takes about 15 seconds to open and configure for use. I got it for around fifty five dollars, which made it about half the price of other cargo organizers that didn't appear to be nearly the quality of this. I'm tempted to buy another... just in case. EXCELLENT quality! You will NOT be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Low profile storage solution
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about half a year. It does not slip as described both in city and highway driving. This organizer has a nice low profile allowing one to securely place smaller items in one of three maximum compartments. I would recommend this for organizing smaller items in one's trunk. No issues with durability or craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Smells like gasoline or diesel
customer_reviews.text: Smells like gasoline or diesel. Wish I had seen the other negative reviews first. Returning it. Otherwise it would be 5 starts.
customer_reviews.author: L8b5

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer, hard to find size.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, fits perfect in back of an Audi q5. It did slide around on the liner, which is a smooth plastic and slippery. Each end of the organizer has a plastic loop, so my son used rope and attached them to the d-rings in the floor. Worked perfectly and no movement. Very useful and seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: SM Bren

customer_reviews.title: Handy for Trucks and Cars
customer_reviews.text: Once you pack 2 kids and a large dog into the passenger compartment of a vehicle, there is not much room for groceries. If you just heave bags of groceries into the back of a car or truck, you end up with a mess and potentially food based projectiles. This organizer made stowing groceries so much easier and safer. It packs down flat if you need that space...well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robb Wolf

customer_reviews.title: This was the answer for me!
customer_reviews.text: I took a long time deciding to buy this, and my advice to others is : get it! This organizer is so sturdy. The dividers are ingenious and very sturdy. This replaced a taller one with 2 square sections, so I was afraid I wouldn't be able to store everything. It somehow held everything with room to spare, a lower profile, and taking less room in the trunk. Fabulous! I got one to keep up permanently for all the fluids, jumper cables, rain shoes, umbrella, etc, etc, and one that I'm keeping folded to use as needed. I'm very happy with this purchase. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Great car organizer
customer_reviews.text: helps *corral* all those necessities one needs to carry in the car. I have a small SVU and it fits perfectly across the back of it and there is still room for bags of groceries or whatever else I need to carry. If I need room for something larger as when the seats are put down, I just turn the organizer side-ways; it moves easily enough (I have a protection mat on the carpeting which probably helps this to move more easily). It also seems study enough and I like that I can adjust the size of its compartments to fit whatever I need to carry.
customer_reviews.author: JEG

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell!
customer_reviews.text: Stinks so bad I can’t put it in the car. Ruined a $25,000 car, New car smell is gone. Smells like a chemical factory. Can’t drive it with windows up. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Rola 59001 M.O.V.E. Rigid-Base Trunk Organizer, Customizable Storage, Removable (Black)
product_meta.description:
Size:38" Interior OrganizerThe ROLA M.O.V.E. Rigid-Base Trunk Organizer is a smart, effective way to keep your vehicle clutter free and organize groceries, travel accessories, athletic and sports equipment, medical items, tools, cleaning supplies and more. Built extra large for added storage, this premium-quality unit fits cars, trucks, SUVs, vans, and a wide array of other vehicles. Movable interior dividers allow you to customize the cargo area and create four well-sized compartments that can accommodate items up to 3 feet long. The addition of two exterior mesh pockets provides extra versatility, while a non-slip base helps prevent the organizer from sliding during sudden stops or fast cornering so your gear stays in place at the back of your vehicle. Set-up is easy with the spring-loaded, self-opening system while sturdy handles help you transport light loads. In between uses, the rigid base folds flat for simple and convenient storage.

AMAZON.COM
The ROLA 59001 Mobile Organizational Vehicle Equipment (MOVE) Rigid Base Vehicle Organizer is a smart, effective way to keep your vehicle clutter-free and organized. ROLA has created this handy product to keep your accessories neat and secure. Simply load it into the trunk or rear cargo space of your vehicle and you'll have plenty of room to store gear, groceries, and other items. The patent-pending rigid base and the ability to fold flat for easy storage makes this premium product a perfect addition to a wide array of vehicles.

 



Customize your MOVE with moveable interior dividers for groceries, camping and sporting gear, and supplies. 

Spring-loaded organizer features a rigid base and built-in handles for easy transport. See it folded flat. Trucks, SUVs, and many types of cars can haul a lot of cargo. But if you don't want to soil the carpet or damage the interior, the MOVE organizer is an extra-large, premium-quality organizational solution that is durable and easy to use. The exclusive, spring-loaded, self-opening system makes it a breeze to pop open, so set-up is quick and easy. You can also customize the MOVE with moveable interior dividers. The 59001 measures 38 x 15 x 7 inches, and can accommodate baseball bats and other long items that measure up to three feet. And with the non-slip material, you can count on the MOVE to stay put in the back of your vehicle, even during quick stops or fast cornering. This organizer is built with sturdy handles for transporting light loads, and it sports handy exterior mesh pockets for greater versatility.

 About ROLA
For more than 20 years, ROLA has been Australia's premier vehicle outfitter for roof racks and cargo management products. Founded and based in Australia, ROLA is a strong brand renowned for supplying cargo management solutions, specializing in rooftop carrying products. The company is extending its representation in the United States by entering a broad range of rooftop and inside/rear-of-vehicle cargo solutions. ROLA's innovative, stylish designs produce vehicle organization products that make it easier for consumers to move their gear safely and effectively, to and from their vehicles.

 
Manufacturer Warranty
Five-year limited manufacturer warranty.
feature_bullets: Removable trunk organizer that's ideal for groceries, travel accessories, gym equipment, and more
Features rigid base and fold-flat design for easy storage
Non-slip material prevents sliding during sudden stops or fast cornering
Moveable interior dividers, sturdy handles, and exterior mesh pockets add to convenience and storage options
Dimensions measure 38" x 15" x 7", item is black in color

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,708 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
